data.title: Gallery: Shea Justice (CFA’93)
data.meta_description: Shea Justice of Sudbury, Mass., participated in an art exhibitionat Cambridge College with other members of Violence Transformed, an arts advocacy group.
data.text:
Shea Justice of Sudbury, Mass., participated in an art exhibition at Cambridge College with other members of Violence Transformed, an arts advocacy group.

The exhibition, Power of Art: Take a Look!, was on view from November to December 2023. In November, Justice was interviewed for the Bay State Banner by fellow Boston artist and activist L’Merchie Frazier. In June 2022, he was the subject of a Boston Globe article about his History Is No Mystery exhibition at Boston’s Fountain Street Gallery; a later exhibition, History Is No Mystery: The Conversation Continues, ran at the Hopkinton Center for the Arts in 2023.

Justice is a member of Northeastern University’s African American Master Artists-in-Residence Program.
